== Main inclusion report for monodevelop ==

=== Requirements ===
# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe (arch: all)
# ''Rationale:'' The package is desirable for main, enables rapid development on the Gnome/Mono platform
# ''Security:'' No security issues reported
# ''Quality assurance:''
** The package contains an integrated development environment for Mono and Gtk# applications.  Usage is readily picked up by anyone familiar with another IDE.
** Maintained upstream by Todd Berman and a group of regular contributors.  Key part of the Mono community, well supported.
** No unreasonable Debian bugs.
 0. ''Standards compliance:''
** The package meets the FHS and Debian Policy.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** Depends on Gnome, Mono, gtk-sharp2, gtksourceview-sharp2, gecko-sharp2, xterm, monodoc
